game_description: Those boards don't work on water! Outatime is a futuristic multiplayer hoverboard racing game. Lean-to-move system designed from the ground up for VR. Race against the clock and other hoverboarders in a futuristic setting. Will you claim victory, complete the race, or be out of time...
review_1: nice game, I could see this being a the next big multiplayer/social game. if the hover board were just a little more responsive when turning head or have a setting to change responsiveness would be nice. Or put in a option for stick turning/acceleration I could do some really cool tricks in the hoverboard park.
review_3: It just glitched when I tried to load a track. Nothing worked
review_4: This is definitely one of the games of all time. It is a lot of fun just racing with friends and insulting the dev when I know it is all my fault. That's right Mini I do live in your walls. Either way I can not wait to crush your time and play this for a video! TLDR: Sub to quest taker
review_5: Its still a demo but a very fun demo. Ive had fun trying to get the fastest times and racing around the track, very well made game with good music and fun multiplayer, if you are looking for a fun little racing game with your friends this is a good option!
